column4: Whenever I run apt-get, I get an error message: "WARNING: /usr/share/pyshared/papyon-0.4.6.egg-info is linked but does not belong to any package."  I tried apt-get --reinstalling python-papyon, with no luck.  Any suggestions on how to get rid of this error message?
Running that command seemed to do nothing, there was no output.
k, also try sudo apt-get install -f
